quotes.quote: The best way to find the opportunity in the future is to prepare yourself for it today.
The best way to prepare for life is to begin to live.
If you do not prepare yourself physically to succeed, you must prepare yourself mentally for the humiliation of failure.
We shouldn't just live for today; we should prepare for tomorrow.
It is better to look ahead and prepare than to look back and regret.
You prepare yourself by concentrating on what you have to do out on the field.
Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
The challenge of education is not to prepare a person for success, but to prepare him for failure.
You should prepare for your future, you cant stop it from coming.
Our tears prepare the ground for our future growth.
You cannot prepare for war and peace at the same time.
We can not prepare for defeat and expect to live a life in Victory.
Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised.
It's better to prepare than to repair.
Prepare to win, or lose to someone who is.
You must mentally prepare to conquer any situation.
Prepare your mind to receive the best that life has to offer.
All we can do to prepare rightly for tomorrow is to do the right thing today.
No one prepares to lose ... we prepare to win.
Prepare yourself so that you can be a rainbow in somebody else's cloud.
Don't let your fear paralyze you. Prepare yourself not only technically, but also emotionally.
It is thrifty to prepare today for the wants of tomorrow.
Prepare for every game like you just lost your last game
We prepare for success by acquiring virtues.
You prepare. You study. You've got to be ready for anything.
If you don't prepare, you could lose everything. If you prepare for the worst and nothing happens, you've lost nothing.
We may not be able to prepare the future for our children, but we can at least prepare our children for the future.
Anything you pray for, you need to prepare for.
Prepare for the worst so the best will happen.
To not prepare is the greatest of crimes; to be prepared beforehand for any contingency is the greatest of virtues.
